auth_sentence.content: His next wife was Statilia Messalina, whose first husband Nero had executed.
auth_sentence.res_content: His next wife was Statilia Messalina, whose first husband Nero had executed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His next wife was Statilia Messalina, whose first husband Nero had executed.

auth_sentence.content: "I've been called everything from Messalina to a dope fiend," she eventually admitted to Myrna Loy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I've been called everything from Messalina to a dope fiend," she eventually admitted to Myrna Loy.
